nodes.bodyText: Wrong modifier order, this should be private static final.

ff83a01

Constants should follow the snake-case convention and should be put on top.
Also, this constant's name is a bit meaningless towards what it does, something like CONFIG_PREFIX would be more accurate in my opinion.
Here's my suggested change, could you please also move it to the top of the class?

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                private final static String backpacks = "backpacks.";
          
          
            
                private static final String CONFIG_PREFIX = "backpacks.";

Also I still think this should be at the top, above this line private final PlayerProfile profile; with an empty line above it.
